title: Midterm environment looks more like 2010 than 2018 in NBC News poll

sentence: Friday, Apr 1, 2022 5:16:43 PM +00:00 Jeff Singer GA-Sen: Former football star Herschel Walker has been the undisputed frontrunner for the Republican nomination to take on Democratic Sen. Raphael Warnock from the moment he entered the race in August, but now his intra-party critics are preparing to wage an expensive ad campaign to weaken him in ahead of the May 24 primary.
title: Daily Kos Elections Live Digest: 4/1
